mapper.insert:
insert into shop_sales_line( pid, sku_id, sku_code, product_code, sale_id, unt_price, real_price, sale_discount, qty, dis_amount, real_amount, is_gift, note ) values
( #{item.pid}, #{item.skuId}, #{item.skuCode}, #{item.productCode}, #{item.saleId}, #{item.untPrice}, #{item.realPrice}, #{item.saleDiscount}, #{item.qty}, #{item.disAmount}, #{item.realAmount}, #{item.isGift}, #{item.note} )
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) from shop_sales_line s LEFT JOIN product_sku ps on ps.code = s.sku_code and s.product_code = ps.product_code LEFT JOIN product p on p.code = ps.product_code WHERE TRUE
and s.pid = #{pid}
